m_szDocTitle: Mitsubishi Outlander Plug-in Release Date Pushed Back Again | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Mitsubishi Outlander Plug-in Release Date Pushed Back Again May 21st, 2014 by James Ayre   Originally published on Planetsave . Mitsubishi’s Outlander Plug-in, a plug-in hybrid electric SUV or crossover, has had its US release date pushed back yet again, according to recent reports. As it stands now, it likely won’t hit the market until the 4th quarter of 2015 — possibly even later than that, maybe first quarter 2016. Given that the PHEV is already on sale in the European, Australian, and New Zealand markets, — and debuted in Japan back in January 2013 — the looonnnggg delay for the American r
